Detailed Description

Button polling and debouncing.

Author:
M.P. Hayes
Date:
16 Feb 2003
Note:
This debounces pushbuttons and switches using a polled wait-and-see method implemented with a state machine. It assumes that a pushed button gives a logic low on the input port.
